title: What are the advantages and disadvantages of a DVD? - Quora

response.answer_text: To be brutally honest , since online download of videos came in and advent of pen drive and extended hdd technology , dvd is out of the market , so no advantages of a DVD or a dvd player , most led TVs come with usb 3.0 technology , still if u want a dvd player to use , well u can play music with the usb port , support of movies is pretty less may be divx will work and mpeg 2 compression and in some cases MPEG4 compression will work , but same movies that work on my led doesn't work on my dvd player which is a Phillips HD DVD player , so if I want to compare benefits of both , my DVD player is absolutely useless compared to my LED TV

Advantage would be if properly cared and handled, that data will last forever . Disadvantages, compared to some of the other storage devices ie.. flashdrives etc, their storage space is extremely limited. There are Disadvantages in flash drives and ssd type storage in that their lifespan is limited compared to a cd, DVD, bluray disk that is properly cared for
